MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH7 postcode area of Buckley affecting properties in Higher Common Road, Etna Road, Church Road and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and became aware of it at 10:02am. Our engineers have arrived at Knowle Park Estate substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:25am on 10th November 2020
